title: System Management at Hyundai Mobis
subTitle: Maintaining and optimising multiple internal systems
overviewContent: Managed and optimised multiple internal systems at Hyundai Mobis, ensuring reliable performance and seamless operation. Responsibilities included monitoring system operations, troubleshooting issues, performing maintenance, and collaborating with teams to support organisational workflows and business objectives.

jd: Configured, diagnosed, upgraded, and troubleshot in-house systems to maintain optimal performance.
Monitored systems proactively and implemented adjustments to ensure reliable operation.
Performed regular maintenance to guarantee continuous availability and support of IT infrastructure.
Provided support to end-users, resolving system issues and enhancing operational efficiency.
Collaborated with stakeholders to assess IT requirements and implement solutions aligned with organisational objectives.
